<title level="1" right="Rules">[Scroll Statistics](/Rules.aspx?ID=722)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 564 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
All scrolls have the same base statistics unless noted otherwise. A scroll has light Bulk, and it must be held in one hand to be activated.
</column>

</column>

</row>
